insert into buy_back ( id, payment_id, no, product_type_id, supplier_id, supplier_name, date, back_date, back_way, number, money, user_id, user_name, text, datetime
) values ( #id#, #paymentId#, #no#, #productTypeId#, #supplierId#, #supplierName#, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'), #backDate#, #backWay#, #number#, #money#, #userId#, #userName#, #text#, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') )

sqlMap.select:
select payment.id as id, payment.product_type_id as productTypeId, IFNULL(product_type.name,'') as productTypeName, payment.supplier_id as supplierId, payment.supplier_name as supplierName, IFNULL(payment.money,0) as paymentMoney , IFNULL(ma.money,0) as alreadyAppointMoney, IFNULL(mb.money,0) as alreadyBackMoney , (IFNULL(payment.money,0) - IFNULL(ma.money,0) - IFNULL(mb.money,0) )as canBackMoney
from payment left join product_type on payment.product_type_id= product_type.id
left JOIN ( select payment.id as id, sum(IFNULL(payment_detail.money,0)) as money from payment left JOIN payment_detail on payment.id=payment_detail.payment_id where payment.id=#id# group by payment_detail.payment_id ) as ma on payment.id=ma.id
left JOIN ( SELECT buy_back.payment_id as id,sum(IFNULL(buy_back.money,0)) as money from buy_back where buy_back.payment_id=#id# group by buy_back.payment_id ) as mb on payment.id=mb.id
where payment.id=#id#
